note.p: Irish shopkeeper, entrepreneur, and polemicist. Owned a large drapers and hardware shop specialising in shoemaking in Kilfinane, co. Limerick, Ireland. Wrote a number of pamphlets including Darwin confounded (1876).
Census returns of Ireland 1911 (www.census.nationalarchives.ie/reels/nai002733293/, accessed 14 August 2014)
Ireland, civil registration deaths index, 1864–1958 (Ancestry.com, accessed 14 August 2014)
